message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Think of it as an investment in my future proposals!
You're being a bit greedy, aren't you? I'll give you a fair share, but don't expect any more generosity from me!
Okay, I see your point.  Let's split it 60/40.  I'm not going to give in to your intimidation tactics, but I'm willing to be reasonable.
You think you're being reasonable, but I'm not sure you're being smart. I'll give you a bit more than before, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
